New Records: Suryakumar Yadav's third T20I century in only 43 innings
India's 11th unbeaten streak in T20I bilaterals at home
Key Match Events: Rahul Tripathi's blazing start and 35 off 16 balls
Suryakumar Yadav's stunning century with 9 sixes and 7 fours
Axar Patel's 21 off 9 in an unbroken 39-run stand with Suryakumar
Post-Match Reflections: India's captain on their 2-1 series win
Suryakumar Yadav's comments on his century and the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win took India's unbeaten streak in T20I bilaterals at home to 11 series
Sri Lanka's middle-order collapse and inability to challenge the hosts
Others: The match was played on a tacky pitch at the start of the innings
Suryakumar Yadav's ability to maintain a control percentage of over 84 despite hitting 9 sixes and 7 fours
